price:
One koji su tele prihvatili stići će, doista, srdžba Gospodara njihova i poniženje još na ovom svijetu. Tako Mi kažnjavamo one koji kuju
laži.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ سَيَنَالُهُمۡ غَضَبٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡ وَذِلَّةٞ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُفۡتَرِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ittakhadhū al-ʿij'la sayanāluhum ghaḍabun min rabbihim wadhillatun fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wakadhālika najzī al-muf'tarīna
